WorkItem.Description:
Hello, 
 
Load from Armory is very intuitive and easy.   I am stumped on the "Load from Charatcter Profiler" process.  The process: File >Load from Character Profiler>"Look in dialogue box appears".   I don't know where to look.  I have searched the site and had no luck finding instructions.  See screen shot in attached.   Your help is most appreciated.
 
Very nice application = when I get a job I will be sure to donate.
WorkItem.Summary: Request Link to Instructions for "Load from Character Profiler"

Comments.Message: Ah hah, we should have a help topic for that, good point. Can someone take care of that? Regardless, it's looking for the lua data file from the Character Profiler addon.

Was Character Profiler ever fixed for 3.3.x on the official download?  And, somewhat related, have we decided to at some point support other, similar addons (DataStore [Altoholic], Warehouse [Carbonite])?

Update: Recieved Error 

---Procedure--- 
Downloaded:  rpgo-CharacterProfiler version 3.1.0
From: Website www.curse.com

Downloaded character profile by performing the following:  
1. Logged in to WoW 
2. Turned off all addons except  rpgo-CharacterProfiler
3. Selected character and clicked "Enter World" command button
4. Once in the Realm, I :

     •opened Character Frame ('C'); hit 'save'
     •opened Bank
     •opened each Profession
     •opened your Mailbox
     •opened Character Frame ('C'); hit 'save'

5. Logged out of WOW

Attempted to access the character profile in Rawr through the following process: 

6. Launched Rawr
7. File>Load from Character Profiler>Open dialogue box appears
8. Within the "OPEN" dialogue box, click the "Look In' drop down and find the location of your "SavedVariables" folder
       **for me this was:  C:\Program Files\World of Warcraft\WTF\Account\SavedVariables
9. Selected the CharacterProfiler.lua file
10. Clicked the "open command button" within the OPEN dialogue box
11. The "CHOOSE REALM AND CHARACTER" dialogue box appears
         **Did not have to choose becasue realm and character prepopulated the only character extracted with  rpgo-CharacterProfiler
12.  Clicked the "ok command button" within the CHOOSE REALM AND CHARACTER dialogue box.
13.  ERROR: The Given key was not found in the dictionary
        ****See Screen Shot Attached

Character profiler is NOT updated on Curse's site. There is an updated version available from Wowsage's site, at 
http://www.wowsage.com/files/CharacterProfiler.zip
This new version does work for Rawr, I'm using it now.

Thank you Azaram for where to find an up-to-date version of CharacterProfiler.zip.  After downloading the new version, I continued to experiece profiler scan issues/errors.   Decided to do addon cleanup.   

Procedure: 
a) Renamed Cache, WTF, and Interface folders (to LastCache, LastWTF, LastInterface) found under C:\Program Files\World of Warcraft
b) Ran repair.exe also found in C:\Program Files\World of Warcraft
     *ran repair using "Reset and File check" (first command button) function
c) Procedure complete

Then reloaded Rawr>Opened Wow>Performed character download process as described earlier in this discussion thread.

RESULTS:  Character Equip and Talents downloaded without error.    Warlock character does not show glyph of quickening, but I think that deserves a separate issue log.    

***ISSUE CLOSED*** 
 I think my issue has been resolved.  Thanks to everyone that contributed
